tns:patch.author: Arty
tns:patch.description: Create the Type of Cooperation category

script.lang: SELECT count(*) from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_cooperation'

INSERT INTO amp_category_class(id, category_name, keyname, description, is_multiselect, is_ordered) VALUES (nextval('amp_category_class_seq'), 'Type of Cooperation' , 'type_of_cooperation', '', 'f', 'f');
INSERT INTO amp_category_value(id, category_value, amp_category_class_id, index_column) VALUES (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Official Development Aid (ODA)', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_cooperation'), 0), (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Bilateral South South Cooperation', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_cooperation'), 1), (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Triangular South South Cooperation', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_cooperation'), 2), (nextval('amp_category_value_seq'), 'Regional South South Cooperation', (select id from amp_category_class where keyname='type_of_cooperation'), 3);
